term.title: diastereomorphism

item.text: The relationship between objects (or models) analogous to that between diastereoisomeric molecular entities.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2193. 'Basic terminology of stereochemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2206 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122193)

term.citation: Citation: 'diastereomorphism' in IUPAC Compendium of Chemical Terminology, 5th ed. International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry; 2025. Online version 5.0.0, 2025. 10.1351/goldbook.D01683

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
